title: Projects
text:
Here are some of my key projects that showcase my analytical capabilities and business acumen:





Aug 2022 - Aug 2024





Conducted strategic market research using NLP (BERT model) to analyze 1,000+ competitor reviews
Identified consumer trends enabling targeted campaigns that generated ¥50k in sales within the first month
Implemented inventory forecasting strategies using the Prophet model, reducing forecast errors from 30% to 12%
Applied RFM segmentation to personalize marketing campaigns, boosting repeat purchase rates from 18% to 42%
Streamlined procurement and logistics processes, cutting shipping costs by 25% and procurement expenses by 15%




Python NLP Prophet Model RFM Segmentation Supply Chain Optimization








May 2022 - Aug 2022





Leveraged Python RFM + K-means clustering to segment 500K+ fans, identifying high-value groups contributing 65% of historical engagement
Deployed Weibo/Douyin SEO tactics including trending topic hijacking and long-tail keyword optimization, boosting organic reach by 40%
Developed Python ETL pipelines automating data collection from Weibo/Douyin APIs, reducing reporting time by 65%
Secured #22 Weibo & #20 Douyin hot search rankings through strategic KOL partnerships
Increased retention by 25% via personalized AR filters and post-campaign discounts




Python K-means Clustering RFM Analysis SEO ETL Pipelines API Integration











Sep 2024 - Dec 2024





Analyzed 100K+ transaction records using SQL and Tableau, identifying food category as top revenue drivers
Optimized pricing strategies to increase projected revenue by ¥50K
Analyzed supplier performance using “reputation-revenue” correlation with boxplots/scatterplots
Enhanced profit-sharing models and improved supplier exposure resulting in $50K incremental revenue
Built a logistic regression model (85% accuracy) to predict visitor preferences, leading to a 20% increase in customer satisfaction




SQL Tableau Logistic Regression Data Visualization Business Strategy








Jan 2024 - May 2024





Led agile development through bi-weekly sprints, leveraging the Meta framework to improve AI facial recognition accuracy by 23%
Reduced hardware costs by 40% while increasing recognition accuracy from 75% to 92%
Architected a hybrid B2C/B2B pricing model (Basic/Premium + bulk discounts), validated via Business Model Canvas workshops
Reduced customer acquisition costs by 20% through strategic insurer partnerships
Ensured HIPAA compliance and FDA pre-certification, implementing a flexible pre-sale inventory model to mitigate operational risks




AI AR Agile Methodology Business Model Canvas Regulatory Compliance











Apr 2025





Processed the Lightcast dataset using PySpark and converted it into Pandas DataFrames for advanced plotting
Created interactive scatter plots and histograms using Plotly to analyze:

Salary distribution by education level (Bachelor’s or lower vs. Master’s/PhD)
Remote work categories (Remote, Onsite, Hybrid)

Applied group-based median imputation to handle missing salary values
Produced salary insights by cross-segmenting experience, education, and work location
Embedded written insights within each chart to guide interpretation




PySpark Pandas Plotly Data Imputation Data Visualization




Histogram – Bachelor’s or Lower 
Histogram – Master’s or PhD 
Scatter Plot – Bachelor’s or Lower 
Scatter Plot – Master’s or PhD 




Histogram – Hybrid 
Histogram – Onsite 
Histogram – Remote 
Scatter Plot – Hybrid 
Scatter Plot – Onsite 
Scatter Plot – Remote

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Download CV (PDF)





May 2024 - May 2025


MS in Business Analytics

Boston University
GPA: 3.46/4.0
Relevant Courses: - Business Analytics Foundations - Operations Management - Financial Concepts - Quantitative and Qualitative Decision Making - Enterprise Risk Analytics - Marketing Analytics - Strategic Management



Aug 2019 - Aug 2023


Bachelor in Hospitality, Retail & Sport Management & Economics

University of South Carolina & Boston University
GPA: 3.93/4.0
Relevant Courses: - Microeconomics - Macroeconomics - Industrial Organization - Development Economics - International Economics - Labor Economics - International Trade








Aug 2022 - Aug 2024


Entrepreneur | Online Beauty Shop


Market Research & Customer Targeting: Conducted strategic market research leveraging NLP (BERT model) to analyze 1,000+ competitor reviews, identifying consumer trends and enabling targeted campaigns that generated ¥50k in sales within the first month with a 15% click-through rate.
Operational Efficiency & Forecasting: Implemented inventory forecasting strategies using the Prophet model, reducing forecast errors from 30% to 12%, increasing inventory turnover by 40%, and driving monthly orders to over 150+.
Customer Segmentation & Retention: Applied RFM segmentation to personalize marketing campaigns, boosting repeat purchase rates from 18% to 42% and increasing customer lifetime value by 50%, demonstrating customer journey mapping capabilities.
Supply Chain Optimization: Streamlined procurement and logistics processes, cutting shipping costs by 25% and procurement expenses by 15%, enhancing overall operational efficiency, achieving operational excellence through process digitization.




May 2022 - Aug 2022


Digital Marketing Specialist | Beijing Radio Cultural Transmission Co., Ltd


Strategic Digital Campaigns: Leveraged Python RFM+chaining with K-means clustering to segment 500K+ fans, identifying high-value groups contributing 65% of historical engagement.
Audience Insights & Engagement: Deployed Weibo/Douyin SEO tactics including trending topic hijacking (12 hashtags) and long-tail keyword optimization, boosting organic reach by 40% through algorithmic content optimization.
Automation & Reporting Optimization: Developed Python ETL pipelines automating data collection from Weibo/Douyin APIs and performance tracking, reducing reporting time by 65% and enhancing data accuracy.
High-Impact Marketing Results: Secured #22 Weibo & #20 Douyin hot search rankings through strategic KOL partnerships and algorithmic content optimization. Increased retention by 25% via personalized AR filters and post-campaign discounts demonstrating customer-centric innovation.




May 2022 - Aug 2022


Social Activities Coordinator | Bridging Hope Charity Foundation


Community Mental Health Programs: Designed and executed art-based mental health initiatives for 200+ children across 20+ communities, with 80% of participants reporting improved emotional resilience-directly benefiting 500+ families.
Volunteer Leadership & Coordination: Managed and trained 30 volunteers, implementing efficiency optimizations that improved program execution by 40%.
Program Logistics & Impact Assessment: Orchestrated large-scale community events, integrating real-time feedback mechanisms to achieve a 95% participant satisfaction rate.
Stakeholder Collaboration: Partnered with scholars and mental health professionals to design the “Art Communication” curriculum, enhancing engagement by 35% and expanding program reach.









Sep 2024 - Dec 2024


LobsterLand Fantasy Winter Carnival


Revenue Analysis & Business Strategy: Analyzed 100K+ transaction records using SQL and Tableau, identifying food category as top revenue drivers and optimizing pricing strategies to increase projected revenue by ¥50K.
Supplier Ecosystem Optimization: Analyzed supplier performance using “reputation-revenue” correlation by boxplots/scatterplots, enhancing profit-sharing models and improving supplier exposure resulting in $50K incremental revenue.
Customer Engagement & Digitalization: Built a logistic regression model (85% accuracy) to predict visitor preferences, leading to a 20% increase in customer satisfaction through data-driven engagement strategies.




Jan 2024 - May 2024


AR-Assisted Solution for Alzheimer’s Patients


AI Performance Enhancement: Led agile development through bi-weekly sprints, leveraging the Meta framework to improve AI facial recognition accuracy by 23% (75% - 92%) while reducing hardware costs by 40%.
Revenue Model & Cost Efficiency: Architected a hybrid B2C/B2B pricing model (Basic/Premium + bulk discounts), validated via Business Model Canvas workshops, and reduced customer acquisition costs by 20% through strategic insurer partnerships.
Regulatory Compliance & Risk Management: Ensured HIPAA compliance and FDA pre-certification, implementing a flexible pre-sale inventory model to mitigate operational risks and accelerate time-to-market.









Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn)
SQL
R (Tidyverse, Caret)
VBA
Tableau (Certified)
Power BI
AWS QuickSight
NLP





CLV Modeling
A/B Testing
Digital Transformation
Agile Optimization
DCF/ROI Analysis (Business Model Canvas)





English (Fluent; full professional proficiency)
Mandarin (Native)

title: About Me
text:
Hello, I’m Maihong
I’m a Business Analytics professional with a passion for transforming complex data into actionable insights. With my foundation in Economics and hands-on entrepreneurial experience, I bridge the gap between analytical thinking and practical business solutions.
My journey through data science began during my undergraduate studies when I discovered how powerful analytical tools could transform business decision-making. This fascination led me to pursue my MS in Business Analytics at Boston University, where I’ve been expanding my technical toolkit while developing strategic business acumen.
What drives me is the challenge of finding the story behind the numbers and creating value from seemingly disparate data points. Whether it’s optimizing marketing campaigns, streamlining supply chains, or enhancing customer experiences, I find fulfillment in delivering data-driven solutions that make a tangible impact.

title: About Me
text:
My Professional Journey



2022-2024


The Entrepreneur

My entrepreneurial venture with an online beauty shop taught me the real-world application of data science. From implementing NLP models to analyze competitor reviews to designing RFM segmentation strategies that boosted customer retention, I experienced firsthand how analytics drives business growth. This journey shaped my understanding of the full business lifecycle and cemented my belief in data-driven decision making.



2022


The Digital Marketer

At Beijing Radio Cultural Transmission, I discovered my passion for digital audience engagement. By developing Python ETL pipelines and implementing clustering algorithms to segment 500K+ fans, I learned to translate raw engagement metrics into strategic marketing decisions. Seeing our hashtags climb to top rankings on Weibo and Douyin validated the power of data-backed content strategies.



2022


The Community Builder

My work with the Bridging Hope Charity Foundation revealed the human impact of organizational effectiveness. Leading mental health initiatives across communities showed me that solid program management and feedback mechanisms directly enhance human wellbeing. This experience reinforced my commitment to pursuing analytics work that ultimately improves people’s lives.

title: About Me
section: What I Bring to the Table
text:
What I Bring to the Table


Technical Expertise
I combine strong analytical skills with business acumen, leveraging Python, SQL, R, and visualization tools to extract meaningful insights. My approach focuses on creating reproducible, scalable solutions that drive continuous improvement.

Python SQL R Tableau Power BI NLP



Business Perspective
My economics background and entrepreneurial experience give me a unique perspective on analytics problems. I don’t just see numbers—I see opportunities for growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage. This business context shapes how I approach every analytical challenge.

Customer Segmentation Market Research Supply Chain Optimization ROI Analysis



Communication & Collaboration
Data insights are only valuable when they can be understood and implemented. I pride myself on translating complex findings into clear, actionable recommendations, and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to drive implementation.

Data Storytelling Stakeholder Management Cross-functional Collaboration

title: About Me
text:
Personal Interests
Beyond my professional pursuits, I’m passionate about several areas that keep me inspired and balanced:






Behavioral Economics
I’m fascinated by the intersection of psychology and economics. Understanding how humans make decisions—often irrationally—helps me design more effective data models and business strategies.









Photography
Photography teaches me to look at the world from different perspectives. Whether capturing street scenes in Boston or landscapes during my travels, I find it sharpens my observational skills and attention to detail.









Cultural Exploration
Growing up bilingual and having experienced education in both China and the US has fueled my interest in cross-cultural communication. I enjoy exploring how different societies approach problem-solving and innovation.

title: About Me
text:
Looking Forward
My career goal is to lead data analytics initiatives that drive business transformation while creating positive social impact. I’m particularly interested in opportunities where I can apply my analytical expertise to enhance customer experiences, optimize operations, or develop innovative products.
I believe that the most exciting opportunities lie at the intersection of data science, human psychology, and business strategy—and I’m constantly expanding my skills to navigate this evolving landscape.
Whether you’re looking for a collaborator on a data project, seeking analytical insights for your business, or just want to connect with a fellow data enthusiast, I’d love to hear from you. Feel free to reach out and let’s start a conversation!

title: Contact
text:
I’m always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or just connecting with fellow data enthusiasts.





 Email: xuxiaozha11@gmail.com

 GitHub: View my repositories




I typically respond to emails within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please feel free to call or text me. I’m currently based in Boston and available for virtual meetings or in-person meetings in the Boston area.
